entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:59 p.m. EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of freezing rain beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
